casebody.data:
Nancy ROGERS, et al
v.
Claudia METCALF, et al 404P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 28, 2017 Mr. Zeyland G. McKinney, Jr., Attorney at Law, Robbinsville, for Rogers, Nancy Ms. Claudia Metcalf, for Metcalf, Claudia, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of November 2017."
